system.description: The character moves like a blur!
system.trigger: A ranged attack using physical projectiles (arrows, bullets and so on) is made against the character-or a character within their character's reach,
system.effect: The character makes an Agility check, using the attacker's attack result as the target number. If the character's check succeeds, the attack is nullified. On a Fantastic success, the character gets their reaction back.
